title: Thanksgiving Games, Boomer Esiason Interview (Football 11/22)
description:
On a pre-Thanksgiving edition of the Pick Six podcast, Will Brinson, Pete Prisco and Jason La Canfora get you ready for Week 12 in the NFL. The guys discuss Seahawks-Falcons (which is basically a Prisco vs. La Canfora showdown), the future in Seattle, the quarterback situation in Buffalo, and Jerry Jones/Roger Goodell. Then 'Hot Take or Just Right' with a lot of food talk, including bold claims that 'stuffing is the best Thanksgiving option' and that turkey is 'overrated.' Then, Will is joined by NFL on CBS Analyst Boomer Esiason to talk about the Cowboys on and off the field, the AFC playoff picture, the QB mess in Buffalo, the Saints impressive streak, if it's time for the Bengals to move on from Marvin Lewis, and the dynamics of the CBS broadcast team.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
